column4: cron doesn't run with much in the way of environment variables, you have to explicitly define them in the crontab. PATH= DISPLAY= . Still i'm not sure if gui-app would work.
ahh, ok, that helps explain it, even if I script it out?  I put in the script firefox webpage  then call that script via cron?
doesn't like that either though, sorry, I should have explained that I tried that. :)
